strapiPost.title: Weekend Roundup
strapiPost.content:
What we've all been waiting for - here is what we recommend checking out this weekend in NWA:

  • Summer Sidewalk Sale: Saturday downtown Springdale will be hosting a summer sidewalk sale with plenty of local vendors.
  • Cycling Festival: Downtown Rogers is hosting its annual, family-friendly cycling festival this Saturday, which includes the Bike Film Festival Tour.
  • Music events: With 30+ live music performance happening this weekend, it will be tough to not hear some good tunes.
  • Game night: Arkansas Naturals take on in-state rivals, Arkansas Travelers this weekend at Arvest ball park.
  • Pro tour: Buckin' in the Ozarks PBR Tour is making a stop this weekend in Springdale.
  • Sun bathing: In both Fayetteville and Bentonville there is free yoga sessions happening on Sunday.
  • Sunny's on Second: Sunny's, a food and juice bar in downtown Bentonville is opening on Sunday.
  • Food Truck Rodeo: Food trucks and live music happening this Sunday at Crystal Bridges.

See you Monday!
